item.title: Philemon 1
item.description:
Philemon Chapter 1

1Paul, prisoner of ChristMessiah Jesus, and brother Timothy, to our dear fellow worker Philemon, 2to sister Apphia, to fellow soldier Archippus, and to yoursg house church. 3Grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

Phil 1-3

4I always thank God for you, mentioning yousg in my prayers, 5because I hear about your love and faith toward the Lord Jesus and all the saints. 6I pray that fellowshiping with yoursg faith will lead to our experiencing everything good for Christ’s sake. 7Brother, I’m so happy and encouraged by your love, because you refresh the hearts of the saints.
